nOOb install Guide:
-----------------------
1) unzip - Mortal Kombat 4.zip
2) Double-click on "Install.exe" file
3) Click "Install" button (in menu)
4) Select install directory... C:\Program Files
Click "New Folder" and click "OK"
5) Go to installed directory and double-click on "Mk4.reg" file then click "Yes" and "OK"
6) Right-click on "Mortal Kombat 4.exe"
Select "Send To" -> Desktop (create shortcut)
7) Delete original setup folder once game is installed!
Play game and "Kick some Ass" :)

Thanks impulse1990

It works on windows 7 64 Bit.
All you need to do is edit the file Mk4.reg
and add WOW6232Node\ after Software
then save it and run then double click on it to merge it into the registry.

Here are the contents of my file

REGEDIT4
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\WOW6432Node\GT Interactive\Mortal Kombat 4\1.00]
"Path"="."
"Setup"=".\\Setup.exe"
"Config"=
